.. _singularity_plugin_uninstall:

singularity plugin uninstall
----------------------------

Uninstall removes the named plugin from the system

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The 'plugin uninstall' command removes the named plugin from the system

::

  singularity plugin uninstall <name>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ singularity plugin uninstall example.org/plugin

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for uninstall

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity plugin <singularity_plugin>` 	 - Manage Singularity plugins

*Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 12-Oct-2021*
